content: Benefits 1. Ensuring correct filing Hiring a tax agent guarantees that the tax return is filed correctly the first time, following current tax laws. It's important to note that information must be provided by the client, and omitting any details can impact the accuracy of the return. 2. 100% Deductible Fees The fees paid for the services provided by a tax agent are 100% deductible for the following fiscal year. This means that if you paid $120 for the preparation and filing of your return in 2022, you can deduct the entire amount from your taxes payable in 2023. 3. Extended deadline Individuals who engage a tax agent have an extended deadline for filing their tax return until May 17 of the following year. It's crucial to be up to date with your declarations to access this benefit. 4. Timely and Adequate Response to Audits The tax agent ensures providing appropriate and timely responses to audits required by the tax office. When the ATO compares the information provided in the return with other sources (Medicare, banks, payroll, etc.) and finds discrepancies, additional information may be requested, and the tax agent ensures compliance with the stipulated rules. #### Still have questions?
title: services offered - https://www.taxbne.com.au/post/beneficios-de-presentar-mi-declaracion-de-impuestos-con-un-agente-de-impuestos-registrado
